name: Genzaniku

name: Hack

affix: Chance to fight through the pain when enemies hit you.

name: The Butcher's Sickle
affix: 25% chance to drag enemies to you when attacking.

name: Envious Blade
affix: Gain 100% Critical Hit Chance against enemies at full health

name: Eun-jang-do

name: Wizardspike

affix: Increase the size of your Blessed Hammers.

name: Mad Monarch's Scepter

name: Odyn Son
affix: 40% chance to Chain Lightning enemies when you hit them.

name: Solanium
affix: Critical Hits have a 4% chance to spawn a health globe.

name: Arreat's Law
affix: Weapon Throw generates up to 15-20 additional Fury based on how far away the enemy hit is. Maximum benefit when the enemy hit is 20 or more yards away.

name: Azurewrath
affix: Undead and Demon enemies within 25 yards take 650% weapon damage as Holy every second and are sometimes knocked into the air.

name: Fulminator
affix: Lightning damage has a chance to turn enemies into lightning rods, causing them to pulse 555% weapon damage as Lightning every second to nearby enemies for 6 seconds.

name: In-geom
affix: Your skill cooldowns are reduced by 10 seconds for 15 seconds after killing an elite pack.

name: Rimeheart
affix: 10% chance on hit to instantly deal 10000% weapon damage as Cold to enemies that are Frozen.

name: Sever
affix: Slain enemies rest in pieces.

name: Shard of Hate
affix: Elemental skills have a chance to trigger a powerful attack that deals 250% weapon damage:Cold skills trigger Freezing Skull, Poison skills trigger Poison Nova Lightning skills trigger Charged Bolt

name: Skycutter
affix: Chance to summon angelic assistance when attacking.

name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker
affix: Chance on hit to blast your enemy with Lightning, dealing 372% weapon damage as Lightning and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Each enemy hit has their attack speed and movement speed reduced by 30% for 3 seconds. Jumps up to 5 targets.

name: Anessazi Edge
affix: Zombie Dogs stuns enemies around them for 1.5 seconds when summoned.
